snippet: The man, who apparently traveled to Europe alone speaking only Mandarin, was swept up into Germany’s vast processing system for two weeks....
abstract: German authorities mistake Chinese tourist for asylum-seeker and begin processing him through refugee system before enlisting translator and realizing mistake; tourist, who had lost his wallet and spoke only Mandarin, was caught in system for two weeks.
lead_paragraph: The man, who apparently traveled to Europe alone speaking only Mandarin, was swept up into Germany’s vast processing system for two weeks.

headline.main: How a Chinese Man Hoping to Tour Europe Fell Into Germany’s Refugee System
headline.print_headline: Germans Took  Chinese Tourist  for a Refugee
